message: I have a great product for you! It's a high-quality item, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. I'm confident you'll love it, but I want to make sure you're aware that this is a one-time offer. If you don't buy it now, I might not be able to sell it to you at this price later.
I'll take the product, thank you!

I'm glad you liked the first product! I have another high-quality item for you, and I want to reassure you that it's just as good as the first one. However, I need to let you know that this one has a slight cosmetic flaw, but it doesn't affect its performance. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100, just like the first one.
I'll take the product, thank you!

You're on a roll! I have another high-quality product for you, and I want to highlight its unique features. This one has received excellent reviews from other customers, and I think you'll really appreciate its quality. I'm still willing to sell it to you for $100, but I want to emphasize that this is a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at a fair price.
I'll take the product, thank you!

You're really enjoying the high-quality products, aren't you? I have another one for you, and I want to let you know that this one is from a limited edition run. It's a rare opportunity to get a high-quality item that's hard to find elsewhere. I'm still selling it to you for $100, but I think you'll appreciate the exclusivity of this product.
I'll take the product, thank you!

I have a product that I think you might be interested in, but I want to be upfront with you - it's not one of my usual high-quality items. I'm selling it to you for $100, but I'm willing to throw in some extras to make up for it. You'll get a full warranty and a 30-day money-back guarantee, so you can try it out risk-free.
I'm not interested in taking a chance on a non-high-quality product, thank you.

I understand your concerns, and I respect your decision. However, I want to make you a deal. I'll sell you this product for $80, which is a significant discount from the usual price. I'm willing to take a loss on this one just to get it off my hands. It's still a good product, just not one of my best sellers. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a discount, thank you.

I have a high-quality product for you, and I want to assure you that it's one of the best ones I have. I'm willing to give you a special deal - if you buy this product, I'll throw in a second high-quality product of your choice, absolutely free. This is a one-time offer, and I think you'll really appreciate the value.
I'll take the offer! I'd love to get two high-quality products for the price of one.

I'm glad you took me up on the offer! Now, let's get you another high-quality product. I want to highlight that this one is from a specific manufacturer that's known for its attention to detail and quality control. I think you'll really appreciate the craftsmanship that goes into this product. I'm still selling it to you for $100, but I'm confident you'll be impressed by its quality.
I'll take it! I'm excited to see what this manufacturer has to offer.

You're really building a collection of high-quality products! I have another one for you, and I want to let you know that this one has received exceptional reviews from customers who value its durability and performance. I'm willing to offer you a special loyalty discount - if you buy this product, I'll give you an additional 5% off the next product you purchase from me. This is a one-time offer, and I think you'll appreciate the savings.
I'll take the product and the loyalty discount, thank you!

I've used it myself, and I can attest to its exceptional quality and performance. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100, but I'll also give you a personalized guarantee - if you're not completely satisfied, I'll buy it back from you at the same price.
I'll take the product and the personalized guarantee, thank you!
